title: Udyr and Tristana Model Bug
body:
So I was playing a game of Co-op vs AI and I noticed that udyr's model stretched over to my model and I thought it was pretty funny but pls fix riot :D
I've got a screenshot to show what I'm talking about:
http://gyazo.com/bf5b0e0eb08f885c5398f18c8b799303

replies.body: They know Udyr is bugged. Thats why his skins have been disabled.
